mapper.sql: SUBNET_ID, SUBNET_DESC, BEGIN_IP, BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL, END_IP, END_IP_DECIMAL, MASK_BITS, NETMASK, IP_COUNT, SUBNET_PID, IS_IPV6, PLAN_STATUS, USE_STATUS, POOL_ID, CITY_ID, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME, LFT, RGT
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, B.CITY_NAME, C.POOL_NAME FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.VW_SUBNET_STAT A LEFT OUTER JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_DIM_CITY B ON A.CITY_ID = B.CITY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_POOL_CONF C ON A.POOL_ID = C.POOL_ID WHERE A.SUBNET_PID=#{subnetId}
AND (A.PLAN_STATUS=#{planStatus} OR A.WAIT_COUNT > 0)
AND (A.PLAN_STATUS=#{planStatus} OR A.PLANNING_COUNT > 0)
AND (A.PLAN_STATUS=#{planStatus} OR A.PLANNED_COUNT > 0)
ORDER BY A.SUBNET_COUNT desc,A.BEGIN_IP
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES
SUBNET_ID,
SUBNET_DESC,
BEGIN_IP,
BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL,
END_IP,
END_IP_DECIMAL,
MASK_BITS,
NETMASK,
IP_COUNT,
SUBNET_PID,
IS_IPV6,
PLAN_STATUS,
USE_STATUS,
POOL_ID,
CITY_ID,
OPERATOR,
OPERATE_TIME,
LFT,
RGT,

#{subnetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beginIpDecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endIpDecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maskBits,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{netmask,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ipCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{subnetPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isIpv6,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{planStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{useStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{poolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lft,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rgt,jdbcType=INTEGER},

INSERT INTO ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES(SUBNET_ID, SUBNET_DESC, BEGIN_IP, BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL, END_IP, END_IP_DECIMAL,MASK_BITS, NETMASK, IP_COUNT, SUBNET_PID, IS_IPV6, PLAN_STATUS, USE_STATUS, POOL_ID,CITY_ID, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME, LFT, RGT) VALUES
(#{subnet.subnetId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.subnetDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.beginIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.beginIpDecimal, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subnet.endIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.endIpDecimal, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subnet.maskBits, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{subnet.netmask, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.ipCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subnet.subnetPid, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{subnet.isIpv6, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{subnet.planStatus, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{subnet.useStatus, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{subnet.poolId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.cityId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.operator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subnet.operateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subnet.lft, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subnet.rgt, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT T1.*,T2.POOL_NAME,T3.CITY_NAME FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.VW_SUBNET_STAT T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.ip_pool_conf T2 ON T1.POOL_ID=T2.POOL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.ip_dim_city T3 ON T1.CITY_ID=T3.CITY_ID WHERE SUBNET_ID = #{subnetId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES
SUBNET_DESC = #{subnetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_IP = #{beginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL = #{beginIpDecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_IP = #{endIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_IP_DECIMAL = #{endIpDecimal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASK_BITS = #{maskBits,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
NETMASK = #{netmask,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP_COUNT = #{ipCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUBNET_PID = #{subnetPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_IPV6 = #{isIpv6,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PLAN_STATUS = #{planStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
USE_STATUS = #{useStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
POOL_ID = #{poolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LFT = #{lft,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RGT = #{rgt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE SUBNET_ID = #{subnetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT v.SUBNET_ID, v.SUBNET_DESC, v.BEGIN_IP, v.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL, v.END_IP, v.END_IP_DECIMAL, v.MASK_BITS, v.NETMASK, v.PLAN_STATUS, v.USE_STATUS, v.IP_COUNT, v.CITY_ID, v.POOL_ID FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.VW_SUBNET_STAT v WHERE v.IP_COUNT >= #{ipCount} AND v.SUBNET_COUNT = 0 AND v.CITY_ID=#{cityId} AND v.POOL_ID=#{poolId} AND (v.USE_STATUS='-1' OR v.USE_STATUS='1') ORDER BY v.IP_COUNT LIMIT 1 ;

SELECT P.SUBNET_ID, P.SUBNET_DESC FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES C LEFT JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES P ON P.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL <= C.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL AND P.END_IP_DECIMAL >= C.END_IP_DECIMAL AND C.SUBNET_ID != P.SUBNET_ID WHERE C.SUBNET_ID = #{subnetId} AND P.SUBNET_ID IS NOT NULL

select.if: SELECT T1.*,T2.CITY_NAME,T3.POOL_NAME FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_DIM_CITY T2 ON T1.CITY_ID=T2.CITY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_POOL_CONF T3 ON T1.POOL_ID=T3.POOL_ID WHERE T1.PLAN_STATUS=1 ORDER BY T1.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL

SELECT T1.*,T2.CITY_NAME,T3.POOL_NAME FROM IPMS.IP_SUBNET_RES T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN IPMS.IP_DIM_CITY T2 ON T1.CITY_ID=T2.CITY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN IPMS.IP_POOL_CONF T3 ON T1.POOL_ID=T3.POOL_ID WHERE T1.PLAN_STATUS=2 AND T1.POOL_ID =#{poolId} ORDER BY T1.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL

mapper.select: SELECT C.SUBNET_ID FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES P, ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES C WHERE P.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL <= C.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL AND P.END_IP_DECIMAL >= C.END_IP_DECIMAL AND P.SUBNET_ID != C.SUBNET_ID AND P.SUBNET_ID = #{subnetId} AND (C.PLAN_STATUS="3" OR C.PLAN_STATUS='2')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES WHERE SUBNET_ID IN (SELECT subnet_id FROM (SELECT C.SUBNET_ID FROM ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES P, ${SCHEMA_BASE}.IP_SUBNET_RES C WHERE P.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL <= C.BEGIN_IP_DECIMAL AND P.END_IP_DECIMAL >= C.END_IP_DECIMAL AND P.SUBNET_ID != C.SUBNET_ID AND P.SUBNET_ID = #{subnetId}) T)
